msbt.message: I've been finding all sorts of ways to use your present in my routines.
Your present is cooler than an ice-cold compress.
Thanks for the gift! I'm dedicating an entire day of jogging to you.
What a muscular gift! You really know how to juice up arm day!
I just did fingertip push-ups in honor of your present!
The best part? Writing this note means today I'm toning up my word muscles AND my muscle-muscles!
My body is so sore from working out that I can barely hold this pen, but I had to say thanks!
It's just too bad I don't know enough muscular words say thanks. You really know how to gift!
Well, I've been staring at this paper all day trying to figure out how to say that. It's dark now.
Is my brain supposed to get sore from writing that? I mean, it's a muscle, so I guess so. Ow!
